lol.title: LoL
lol.header: If your account is registered, you can use these commands without appending a summoner name to have them trigger on your own summoner name.

commands.description: *Registers* your summoner name to your Discord ID.
Returns a summoner's account level.
Returns a summoner's top three mastery champions.
Returns data on a summoner's ladder rankings.
Returns the time elapsed since a summoner's last match.
Returns the time elapsed since a summoner's last ranked match.
Returns data on a summoner's role preference.
Returns data on a summoner's role preference in ranked play.

admin.title: Admin Functions
admin.header: These commands require certain permissions. Administrator permissions give access to ALL admin commands.

commands.description: Changes Sobbot's server prefix.
Resets Sobbot's server prefix.
Flips a coin.
Rolls a die with `number` sides.
Returns a cute Sobble image.
Returns the answer to your expression.
Returns data on a given Pokedex entry.
Returns data on a given Pokemon.
Returns how long Sobbot has been running.
Returns when Sobbot last started.
Returns a random shade of blue.

coin.title: Currency Functions
coin.header: You must register your account before you can earn or receive soblecoins.

commands.description: *Registers* your Discord ID to the soblecoin database.
Sends `value` of your soblecoins to `user`.
Returns your current soblecoin balance.
Claims a gift box of soblecoins! Has a 2 hour cooldown.
Wagers `value` soblecoins. Win up to 10x!
Returns the current soblecoin shop.
Purchases item `itemID`.
Returns your current inventory.
